Title: eGrid on MS Surface
Description: eGrid is a multi-touch multi-user digital tabletop application for browsing and managing maps. It is useful for control room operations of utility companies. Browsing and annotating maps by different users is easy using eGrid on an interactive digital tabletop, such as MS Surface
HomeWiki:
Project Description
eGrid is a multi-touch multi-user digital tabletop application for browsing and managing maps. It is useful for control room operations of utility companies. Browsing and annotating maps by different users is easy using eGrid on an interactive digital tabletop, such as MS Surface
